description:
The Current's Jill Riley talks about her No. 1 essential band: The Beatles
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube

From May 3 to 10, 2024, The Current counted down the 893 Essential Bands as chosen by you. Getting into the spirit of things, The Current's Morning Show host Jill Riley answers the question: "What band do you consider the most essential?" For Jill, the answer is The Beatles. And it's the same answer for a lot of you, too; in The Current's 893 Essential Bands countdown, you picked The Beatles as No. 1.

Find the countdown here: https://www.thecurrent.org/song-countdown/893-essential-bands-8

title: Jill Riley says why The Beatles are her No. 1 essential band #shorts #thebeatles
